title: Gridded spatial distribution of observations
text:
This subsection concerns the capacity to generate or manipulate gridded data according to different techniques such as interpolation and extrapolation.

Some of these techniques are described in the Guide to Climatological Practices (WMO-No. 100), section 5.9 Estimating data.

These gridded data are spatial data. They are included in this section to show their lineage as a type of derived climate data.
